resources.string: You have not been in contact with any person exposed to the virus, or visited a location subject to be at risk. Please Stay indoor and continue following the government instructions
Someone at this location has been diagnosed with Covid-19. Please take a test now and self isolate for 14 days . Call our services for further assistance.
YOU HAVE BEEN EXPOSED IN THE LAST 10 DAYS
This location has registered more than one cases of Covid-19 for the past 10 days. Please take a test now and self isolate for 14 days .Call our services for further assistance.
